column5: im looking for sugestions as to where to pitch my tent next weekend.  Allot of my normal spot's are not accesable since i downsized from a dodge ram to a toyota carrola.  my wants are as follows, carola accesable, i dont mind gettin a little dirty and rough.  decent fishing from a canoe. want to target either waleye and pike or trout. looking for less than a three hour drive from toronto.  any sugestions?
what are my chances of getting a spot in algonquin without a reservation this weekend? is it usualy packed may24?   will the blackflies be out yet?
Good luck... go on line and see what's open to book!  Black flies... i'm covered in welts from 7 hours on the riding mower today.

Come to North Bay. Lots of good areas to fishj and camp. Talon Lake, Nosbonsing, Nipissing (maybe not in a canoe) Marten River. Provincial parks should have tent spots open. Where ever you go add some inches to Team 2. Don't forget to print off a logo and put the necessary info. on it. Welcome aboard.
